description: Main entry point for the React frontend application, setting up rendering, routing, error boundary, and health check route.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: React component that catches JavaScript errors anywhere in its child component tree, logs the error, and renders a fallback UI.

methods.name: getDerivedStateFromError(error)
methods.description: Static lifecycle method that updates state when an error is caught, used to display fallback UI.

methods.name: componentDidCatch(error, errorInfo)
methods.description: Instance lifecycle method that logs error information when an error occurs in child components.
